title: The Moldovan Town Where 95 Percent Said 'No' To The EU, 'Yes' To Russian TV
snippet:

After the recent EU referendum, locals expressed nostalgia for Soviet times and concerns over Western values.

Across the Balkans takes you to the northeastern edge of the Balkan peninsula, to Moldova’s autonomous region of Gagauzia, home to the Gagauz people.
